name: Birdo and Spades
description:
Birdo the Parrot is trapped in an unknown world with unknown faces. Spades the Cat, a prince, helps him onto his feet.

With five total areas to explore, as well as a second act of story, take Birdo through a wild ride! 

The idea of the game was first formed in 2020, but production did not start until late 2022.

Original game link:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/784944346/
